title: Unable to change Password
body: When I login into the game this is what I get: Security warning, In order to protect your account we're rolling out new password requirements. You must change your League of Legends password immediately before you may login to play. Followed the link, verified my e-mail, and when tried to change the password, it says incorrect password. Tried like 50 times,  tried with changing the email, and got the same message, incorrect password. Anyone know what is going on? sent a ticket, but no answer yet.

replies.body: Are you connecting to the correct region on your patcher?  If you are on another region then the user information wouldn't be recognized.  You can give our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) a go to resolve this, otherwise, our account team can help in your ticket!  We'll reply back as soon as possible!
